tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE location_updates (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE geofenced_regions (
  region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region_name TEXT,
  geo_fence POLYGON
)

CREATE TABLE dwell_times (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  region_id INT,
  dwell_time INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE dwell_times (
    location_id INT,
    region_id INT,
    start_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    end_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    dwell_time INTERVAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (location_id, region_id)
);

CREATE TABLE dwell_times (
    dwell_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    region_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);
